name: Buns: Bunny survivor (itch)
description:
Kill enemies, collect gems, choose upgrades and kill the final boss. Small roguelike game heavily inspired by vampire survivors and shmup games.

Version 1.6 🥕

- beggining of the game is easier

- new enemy: skull that spawn crazy bunnies

- no upgrades require to sacrifice hearts anymore

- small balance changes

Version 1.5 

- added fire and frost dash

- added reroll option every 5th level

- added golden carrot

- added new enemy

- the map has borders now

- small balance changes and fixes

dev progress: https://twitter.com/unikotoast
